entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
